resources.string: The Following Terms and Condition guide this appplication
1) We will use your device as a means of Advertisement
2) The Barcode should show you a genuine screen
3) Dont Spam the database Upload only reasonable books
You Book Is Original.thanks for using Book Manager.

BookManager is a multi purpose Application its helps to check if a book is pirated by scanning the manufacture qr or bar code And it also serve as a means to allow student develope their writing skills by, uploading their own books to the database and their friends or school mate can download it and read.

Welcome to Book Manager Here you Can develope your Writing Skills by uploading your books and your class mate can download your book and read. dont be a secret writer anymore bookmanager can make you popular just in few steps : 
 1. Swipe on the left side of your phone or press the drawer icon on the top left corner of your phone 
 2. Click on books Section . 
 3. Click on upload button and choose your book. 
 NOTE : Please Your book should be in pdf Format and You must have an Internet Connection.
